org.josfranmc.gutenberg.catalog

Class CatalogRdf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.josfranmc.gutenberg.catalog.CatalogRdf

  • public class CatalogRdf
extends java.lang.Object
    It allows to read the RDF files that make up the Gutenberg catalog.

    The data is stored in memory as a HashMap. Each RDF file is stored as an RdfFile object, with key the file identifier.
    This identifier is the same as the book it represents.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Jose Francisco Mena Ceca
    See Also:
    RdfFile, Book
